question: What is the average age difference between passengers traveling together on the same booking?
query:
SELECT AVG(diff) AS average_age_difference
FROM (
    SELECT ABS(p1.age - p2.age) AS diff
    FROM postgres_air.passenger p1
    JOIN postgres_air.passenger p2 ON p1.booking_id = p2.booking_id
         AND p1.passenger_id < p2.passenger_id
    WHERE p1.age IS NOT NULL AND p2.age IS NOT NULL
) AS differences;
